00034 #include <filter.h>

00036 //static REAL onepi = 3.141592653589793;
00037 #ifndef onepi
00038 #define onepi M_PI
00039 #endif /*  */
00040 #ifndef twopi
00041 #define twopi (2*onepi)
00042 #endif /*  */
00043 
00044 RealFIR newFIR_REAL( int size, char *tag )
00045 {
00046     RealFIR p = ( RealFIRDesc * ) safealloc( 1, sizeof( RealFIRDesc ), tag );
00047 
00048     FIRcoef( p ) = ( REAL * ) safealloc( size, sizeof( REAL ), tag );
00049     FIRsize( p ) = size;
00050     FIRtype( p ) = FIR_Undef;
00051     FIRiscomplex( p ) = FALSE;
00052     FIRfqlo( p ) = FIRfqhi( p ) = -1.0;
00053     return p;
00054 }
00055 
00056 ComplexFIR newFIR_COMPLEX( int size, char *tag )
00057 {
00058     ComplexFIR p =
00059         ( ComplexFIRDesc * ) safealloc( 1, sizeof( ComplexFIRDesc ), tag );
00060     FIRcoef( p ) = ( COMPLEX * ) safealloc( size, sizeof( COMPLEX ), tag );
00061     FIRsize( p ) = size;
00062     FIRtype( p ) = FIR_Undef;
00063     FIRiscomplex( p ) = TRUE;
00064     FIRfqlo( p ) = FIRfqhi( p ) = -1.0;
00065     return p;
00066 }
00067 
00068 void delFIR_REAL( RealFIR p )
00069 {
00070     if ( p )
00071     {
00072         delvec_REAL( FIRcoef( p ) );
00073         safefree( ( void * ) p );
00074     }
00075 }
00076 
00077 void delFIR_COMPLEX( ComplexFIR p )
00078 {
00079     if ( p )
00080     {
00081         delvec_COMPLEX( FIRcoef( p ) );
00082         safefree( ( void * ) p );
00083     }
00084 }
00085 
00086 RealFIR newFIR_Lowpass_REAL( REAL cutoff, REAL sr, int size )
00087 {
00088     if ( ( cutoff < 0.0 ) || ( cutoff > ( sr / 2.0 ) ) )
00089         return 0;
00090     else if ( size < 1 )
00091         return 0;
00092     else
00093     {
00094         RealFIR p;
00095         REAL *h,
00096             *w,
00097              fc = cutoff / sr;
00098         REAL corrector = 0.0;
00099         int i,
00100             midpoint;
00101 
00102         if ( !( size & 01 ) )
00103             size++;
00104         midpoint = ( size >> 01 ) | 01;
00105         p = newFIR_REAL( size, "newFIR_Lowpass_REAL" );
00106         h = FIRcoef( p );
00107         w = newvec_REAL( size, "newFIR_Lowpass_REAL window" );
00108         ( void ) makewindow( BLACKMANHARRIS_WINDOW, size, w );
00109 
00110         for ( i = 1; i <= size; i++ )
00111         {
00112             int j = i - 1;
00113 
00114             if ( i != midpoint )
00115                 h[j] =
00116                     ( REAL ) ( ( sin( twopi * ( i - midpoint ) * fc ) /
00117                                  ( onepi * ( i - midpoint ) ) ) * w[j] );
00118             else
00119                 h[midpoint - 1] = 2.0f * fc;
00120         }
00121 
00122         delvec_REAL( w );
00123         FIRtype( p ) = FIR_Lowpass;
00124         return p;
00125     }
00126 }
00127 
00128 ComplexFIR newFIR_Lowpass_COMPLEX( REAL cutoff, REAL sr, int size )
00129 {
00130     if ( ( cutoff < 0.0 ) || ( cutoff > ( sr / 2.0 ) ) )
00131         return 0;
00132     else if ( size < 1 )
00133         return 0;
00134     else
00135     {
00136         ComplexFIR p;
00137         COMPLEX *h;
00138         REAL *w,
00139              fc = cutoff / sr;
00140         int i,
00141             midpoint;
00142 
00143         if ( !( size & 01 ) )
00144             size++;
00145         midpoint = ( size >> 01 ) | 01;
00146         p = newFIR_COMPLEX( size, "newFIR_Lowpass_COMPLEX" );
00147         h = FIRcoef( p );
00148         w = newvec_REAL( size, "newFIR_Lowpass_REAL window" );
00149         ( void ) makewindow( BLACKMANHARRIS_WINDOW, size, w );
00150 
00151         for ( i = 1; i <= size; i++ )
00152         {
00153             int j = i - 1;
00154 
00155             if ( i != midpoint )
00156                 h[j].re =
00157                     ( REAL ) ( ( sin( twopi * ( i - midpoint ) * fc ) /
00158                                  ( onepi * ( i - midpoint ) ) ) * w[j] );
00159             else
00160                 h[midpoint - 1].re = 2.0f * fc;
00161         }
00162 
00163         delvec_REAL( w );
00164         FIRtype( p ) = FIR_Lowpass;
00165         return p;
00166     }
00167 }
00168 
00169 RealFIR newFIR_Bandpass_REAL( REAL lo, REAL hi, REAL sr, int size )
00170 {
00171     if ( ( lo < 0.0 ) || ( hi > ( sr / 2.0 ) ) || ( hi <= lo ) )
00172         return 0;
00173     else if ( size < 1 )
00174         return 0;
00175     else
00176     {
00177         RealFIR p;
00178         REAL *h,
00179             *w,
00180              fc,
00181              ff;
00182         int i,
00183             midpoint;
00184 
00185         if ( !( size & 01 ) )
00186             size++;
00187         midpoint = ( size >> 01 ) | 01;
00188         p = newFIR_REAL( size, "newFIR_Bandpass_REAL" );
00189         h = FIRcoef( p );
00190         w = newvec_REAL( size, "newFIR_Bandpass_REAL window" );
00191         ( void ) makewindow( BLACKMANHARRIS_WINDOW, size, w );
00192 
00193         lo /= sr, hi /= sr;
00194         fc = ( hi - lo ) / 2.0f;
00195         ff = ( REAL ) ( ( lo + hi ) * onepi );
00196 
00197         for ( i = 1; i <= size; i++ )
00198         {
00199             int j = i - 1;
00200 
00201             if ( i != midpoint )
00202                 h[j] =
00203                     ( REAL ) ( ( sin( twopi * ( i - midpoint ) * fc ) /
00204                                  ( onepi * ( i - midpoint ) ) ) * w[j] );
00205             else
00206                 h[midpoint - 1] = 2.0f * fc;
00207             h[j] *= ( REAL ) ( 2.0 * cos( ff * ( i - midpoint ) ) );
00208         }
00209 
00210         delvec_REAL( w );
00211         FIRtype( p ) = FIR_Bandpass;
00212         return p;
00213     }
00214 }
00215 
00216 ComplexFIR newFIR_Bandpass_COMPLEX( REAL lo, REAL hi, REAL sr, int size )
00217 {
00218     if ( ( lo < -( sr / 2.0 ) ) || ( hi > ( sr / 2.0 ) ) || ( hi <= lo ) )
00219         return 0;
00220     else if ( size < 1 )
00221         return 0;
00222     else
00223     {
00224         ComplexFIR p;
00225         COMPLEX *h;
00226         REAL *w,
00227              fc,
00228              ff;
00229         int i,
00230             midpoint;
00231 
00232         if ( !( size & 01 ) )
00233             size++;
00234         midpoint = ( size >> 01 ) | 01;
00235         p = newFIR_COMPLEX( size, "newFIR_Bandpass_COMPLEX" );
00236         h = FIRcoef( p );
00237         w = newvec_REAL( size, "newFIR_Bandpass_COMPLEX window" );
00238         ( void ) makewindow( BLACKMANHARRIS_WINDOW, size, w );
00239 
00240         lo /= sr, hi /= sr;
00241         fc = ( REAL ) ( ( hi - lo ) / 2.0 );
00242         ff = ( REAL ) ( ( lo + hi ) * onepi );
00243 
00244         for ( i = 1; i <= size; i++ )
00245         {
00246             int j = i - 1,
00247                 k = i - midpoint;
00248             REAL tmp,
00249                  phs = ff * k;
00250 
00251             if ( i != midpoint )
00252                 tmp =
00253                     ( REAL ) ( ( sin( twopi * k * fc ) / ( onepi * k ) ) *
00254                                w[j] );
00255             else
00256                 tmp = ( REAL ) ( 2.0 * fc );
00257             tmp *= 2.0;
00258             h[j].re = ( REAL ) ( tmp * cos( phs ) );
00259             h[j].im = ( IMAG ) ( tmp * sin( phs ) );
00260         }
00261 
00262         delvec_REAL( w );
00263         FIRtype( p ) = FIR_Bandpass;
00264         return p;
00265     }
00266 }
00267 
00268 RealFIR newFIR_Highpass_REAL( REAL cutoff, REAL sr, int size )
00269 {
00270     if ( ( cutoff < 0.0 ) || ( cutoff > ( sr / 2.0 ) ) )
00271         return 0;
00272     else if ( size < 1 )
00273         return 0;
00274     else
00275     {
00276         RealFIR p;
00277         REAL *h,
00278             *w,
00279              fc = cutoff / sr;
00280         int i,
00281             midpoint;
00282 
00283         if ( !( size & 01 ) )
00284             size++;
00285         midpoint = ( size >> 01 ) | 01;
00286         p = newFIR_REAL( size, "newFIR_Highpass_REAL" );
00287         h = FIRcoef( p );
00288         w = newvec_REAL( size, "newFIR_Highpass_REAL window" );
00289         ( void ) makewindow( BLACKMANHARRIS_WINDOW, size, w );
00290 
00291         for ( i = 1; i <= size; i++ )
00292         {
00293             int j = i - 1;
00294 
00295             if ( i != midpoint )
00296                 h[j] =
00297                     ( REAL ) ( ( sin( twopi * ( i - midpoint ) * fc ) /
00298                                  ( onepi * ( i - midpoint ) ) ) * w[j] );
00299             else
00300                 h[midpoint - 1] = ( REAL ) ( 2.0 * fc );
00301         }
00302 
00303         for ( i = 1; i <= size; i++ )
00304         {
00305             int j = i - 1;
00306 
00307             if ( i != midpoint )
00308                 h[j] = -h[j];
00309             else
00310                 h[midpoint - 1] = 1.0f - h[midpoint - 1];
00311         }
00312 
00313         delvec_REAL( w );
00314         FIRtype( p ) = FIR_Highpass;
00315         return p;
00316     }
00317 }
00318 
00319 ComplexFIR newFIR_Highpass_COMPLEX( REAL cutoff, REAL sr, int size )
00320 {
00321     if ( ( cutoff < 0.0 ) || ( cutoff > ( sr / 2.0 ) ) )
00322         return 0;
00323     else if ( size < 1 )
00324         return 0;
00325     else
00326     {
00327         ComplexFIR p;
00328         COMPLEX *h;
00329         REAL *w,
00330              fc = cutoff / sr;
00331         int i,
00332             midpoint;
00333 
00334         if ( !( size & 01 ) )
00335             size++;
00336         midpoint = ( size >> 01 ) | 01;
00337         p = newFIR_COMPLEX( size, "newFIR_Highpass_REAL" );
00338         h = FIRcoef( p );
00339         w = newvec_REAL( size, "newFIR_Highpass_REAL window" );
00340         ( void ) makewindow( BLACKMANHARRIS_WINDOW, size, w );
00341 
00342         for ( i = 1; i <= size; i++ )
00343         {
00344             int j = i - 1;
00345 
00346             if ( i != midpoint )
00347                 h[j].re =
00348                     ( REAL ) ( ( sin( twopi * ( i - midpoint ) * fc ) /
00349                                  ( onepi * ( i - midpoint ) ) ) * w[j] );
00350             else
00351                 h[midpoint - 1].re = ( REAL ) ( 2.0 * fc );
00352         }
00353 
00354         for ( i = 1; i <= size; i++ )
00355         {
00356             int j = i - 1;
00357 
00358             if ( i != midpoint )
00359                 h[j].re = -h[j].re;
00360             else
00361                 h[midpoint - 1].re = ( REAL ) ( 1.0 - h[midpoint - 1].re );
00362         }
00363 
00364         delvec_REAL( w );
00365         FIRtype( p ) = FIR_Highpass;
00366         return p;
00367     }
00368 }

00370 RealFIR newFIR_Hilbert_REAL( REAL lo, REAL hi, REAL sr, int size )
00371 {
00372     if ( ( lo < 0.0 ) || ( hi > ( sr / 2.0 ) ) || ( hi <= lo ) )
00373         return 0;
00374     else if ( size < 1 )
00375         return 0;
00376     else
00377     {
00378         RealFIR p;
00379         REAL *h,
00380             *w,
00381              fc,
00382              ff;
00383         int i,
00384             midpoint;
00385 
00386         if ( !( size & 01 ) )
00387             size++;
00388         midpoint = ( size >> 01 ) | 01;
00389         p = newFIR_REAL( size, "newFIR_Hilbert_REAL" );
00390         h = FIRcoef( p );
00391         w = newvec_REAL( size, "newFIR_Hilbert_REAL window" );
00392         ( void ) makewindow( BLACKMANHARRIS_WINDOW, size, w );
00393 
00394         lo /= sr, hi /= sr;
00395         fc = ( REAL ) ( ( hi - lo ) / 2.0 );
00396         ff = ( REAL ) ( ( lo + hi ) * onepi );
00397 
00398         for ( i = 1; i <= size; i++ )
00399         {
00400             int j = i - 1;
00401 
00402             if ( i != midpoint )
00403                 h[j] =
00404                     ( REAL ) ( ( sin( twopi * ( i - midpoint ) * fc ) /
00405                                  ( onepi * ( i - midpoint ) ) ) * w[j] );
00406             else
00407                 h[midpoint - 1] = ( REAL ) ( 2.0 * fc );
00408             h[j] *= ( REAL ) ( 2.0 * sin( ff * ( i - midpoint ) ) );
00409         }
00410 
00411         delvec_REAL( w );
00412         FIRtype( p ) = FIR_Hilbert;
00413         return p;
00414     }
00415 }

00417 ComplexFIR newFIR_Hilbert_COMPLEX( REAL lo, REAL hi, REAL sr, int size )
00418 {
00419     if ( ( lo < 0.0 ) || ( hi > ( sr / 2.0 ) ) || ( hi <= lo ) )
00420         return 0;
00421     else if ( size < 1 )
00422         return 0;
00423     else
00424     {
00425         ComplexFIR p;
00426         COMPLEX *h;
00427         REAL *w,
00428              fc,
00429              ff;
00430         int i,
00431             midpoint;
00432 
00433         if ( !( size & 01 ) )
00434             size++;
00435         midpoint = ( size >> 01 ) | 01;
00436         p = newFIR_COMPLEX( size, "newFIR_Hilbert_COMPLEX" );
00437         h = FIRcoef( p );
00438         w = newvec_REAL( size, "newFIR_Hilbert_COMPLEX window" );
00439         ( void ) makewindow( BLACKMANHARRIS_WINDOW, size, w );
00440 
00441         lo /= sr, hi /= sr;
00442         fc = ( REAL ) ( ( hi - lo ) / 2.0 );
00443         ff = ( REAL ) ( ( lo + hi ) * onepi );
00444 
00445         for ( i = 1; i <= size; i++ )
00446         {
00447             int j = i - 1;
00448             REAL tmp,
00449                  phs = ff * ( i - midpoint );
00450 
00451             if ( i != midpoint )
00452                 tmp =
00453                     ( REAL ) ( ( sin( twopi * ( i - midpoint ) * fc ) /
00454                                  ( onepi * ( i - midpoint ) ) ) * w[j] );
00455             else
00456                 tmp = ( REAL ) ( 2.0 * fc );
00457             tmp *= 2.0f;
00458             /* h[j].re *= tmp * cos(phs); */
00459             h[j].im *= ( REAL ) ( tmp * sin( phs ) );
00460         }
00461 
00462         delvec_REAL( w );
00463         FIRtype( p ) = FIR_Hilbert;
00464         return p;
00465     }
00466 }

00468 RealFIR newFIR_Bandstop_REAL( REAL lo, REAL hi, REAL sr, int size )
00469 {
00470     if ( ( lo < 0.0 ) || ( hi > ( sr / 2.0 ) ) || ( hi <= lo ) )
00471         return 0;
00472     else if ( size < 1 )
00473         return 0;
00474     else
00475     {
00476         RealFIR p;
00477         REAL *h,
00478             *w,
00479              fc,
00480              ff;
00481         int i,
00482             midpoint;
00483 
00484         if ( !( size & 01 ) )
00485             size++;
00486         midpoint = ( size >> 01 ) | 01;
00487         p = newFIR_REAL( size, "newFIR_Bandstop_REAL" );
00488         h = FIRcoef( p );
00489         w = newvec_REAL( size, "newFIR_Bandstop_REAL window" );
00490         ( void ) makewindow( BLACKMANHARRIS_WINDOW, size, w );
00491 
00492         lo /= sr, hi /= sr;
00493         fc = ( REAL ) ( ( hi - lo ) / 2.0 );
00494         ff = ( REAL ) ( ( lo + hi ) * onepi );
00495 
00496         for ( i = 1; i <= size; i++ )
00497         {
00498             int j = i - 1;
00499 
00500             if ( i != midpoint )
00501                 h[j] =
00502                     ( REAL ) ( ( sin( twopi * ( i - midpoint ) * fc ) /
00503                                  ( onepi * ( i - midpoint ) ) ) * w[j] );
00504             else
00505                 h[midpoint - 1] = ( REAL ) ( 2.0 * fc );
00506             h[j] *= ( REAL ) ( 2.0 * cos( ff * ( i - midpoint ) ) );
00507         }
00508 
00509         for ( i = 1; i <= size; i++ )
00510         {
00511             int j = i - 1;
00512 
00513             if ( i != midpoint )
00514                 h[j] = -h[j];
00515             else
00516                 h[midpoint - 1] = ( REAL ) ( 1.0 - h[midpoint - 1] );
00517         }
00518 
00519         delvec_REAL( w );
00520         FIRtype( p ) = FIR_Bandstop;
00521         return p;
00522     }
00523 }
00524 
00525 ComplexFIR newFIR_Bandstop_COMPLEX( REAL lo, REAL hi, REAL sr, int size )
00526 {
00527     if ( ( lo < 0.0 ) || ( hi > ( sr / 2.0 ) ) || ( hi <= lo ) )
00528         return 0;
00529     else if ( size < 1 )
00530         return 0;
00531     else
00532     {
00533         ComplexFIR p;
00534         COMPLEX *h;
00535         REAL *w,
00536              fc,
00537              ff;
00538         int i,
00539             midpoint;
00540 
00541         if ( !( size & 01 ) )
00542             size++;
00543         midpoint = ( size >> 01 ) | 01;
00544         p = newFIR_COMPLEX( size, "newFIR_Bandstop_REAL" );
00545         h = FIRcoef( p );
00546         w = newvec_REAL( size, "newFIR_Bandstop_REAL window" );
00547         ( void ) makewindow( BLACKMANHARRIS_WINDOW, size, w );
00548 
00549         lo /= sr, hi /= sr;
00550         fc = ( REAL ) ( ( hi - lo ) / 2.0 );
00551         ff = ( REAL ) ( ( lo + hi ) * onepi );
00552 
00553         for ( i = 1; i <= size; i++ )
00554         {
00555             int j = i - 1;
00556             REAL tmp,
00557                  phs = ff * ( i - midpoint );
00558 
00559             if ( i != midpoint )
00560                 tmp =
00561                     ( REAL ) ( ( sin( twopi * ( i - midpoint ) * fc ) /
00562                                  ( onepi * ( i - midpoint ) ) ) * w[j] );
00563             else
00564                 tmp = ( REAL ) ( 2.0 * fc );
00565             tmp *= 2.0;
00566             h[j].re *= ( REAL ) ( tmp * cos( phs ) );
00567             h[j].im *= ( REAL ) ( tmp * sin( phs ) );
00568         }
00569 
00570         for ( i = 1; i <= size; i++ )
00571         {
00572             int j = i - 1;
00573 
00574             if ( i != midpoint )
00575                 h[j] = Cmul( h[j], cxminusone );
00576             else
00577                 h[midpoint - 1] = Csub( cxone, h[midpoint - 1] );
00578         }
00579 
00580         delvec_REAL( w );
00581         FIRtype( p ) = FIR_Bandstop;
00582         return p;
00583     }
00584 }

00586 #ifdef notdef
00587 int main( int argc, char **argv )
00588 {
00589     int i,
00590         size = 101;
00591     RealFIR filt;
00592 
00593 #ifdef notdef
00594     filt = newFIR_Lowpass_REAL( 1000.0, 48000.0, size );
00595     for ( i = 0; i < FIRsize( filt ); i++ )
00596         printf( "%d %f\n", i, FIRtap( filt, i ) );
00597     delFIR_REAL( filt );
00598 #endif /*  */
00599 
00600 #ifdef notdef
00601     filt = newFIR_Bandstop_REAL( 1000.0, 2000.0, 48000.0, size );
00602     for ( i = 0; i < FIRsize( filt ); i++ )
00603         printf( "%d %f\n", i, FIRtap( filt, i ) );
00604     delFIR_REAL( filt );
00605 #endif /*  */
00606 
00607     filt = newFIR_Bandpass_REAL( 1000.0, 2000.0, 48000.0, size );
00608     for ( i = 0; i < FIRsize( filt ); i++ )
00609         printf( "%d %f\n", i, FIRtap( filt, i ) );
00610     delFIR_REAL( filt );
00611 
00612 #ifdef notdef
00613     filt = newFIR_Highpass_REAL( 1000.0, 48000.0, size );
00614     for ( i = 0; i < FIRsize( filt ); i++ )
00615         printf( "%d %f\n", i, FIRtap( filt, i ) );
00616     delFIR_REAL( filt );
00617 #endif /*  */
00618 
00619 #ifdef notdef
00620     filt = newFIR_Hilbert_REAL( 1000.0, 2000.0, 48000.0, size );
00621     for ( i = 0; i < FIRsize( filt ); i++ )
00622         printf( "%d %f\n", i, FIRtap( filt, i ) );
00623     delFIR_REAL( filt );
00624 #endif /*  */
00625 
00626 #ifdef notdef
00627     {
00628         COMPLEX *z;
00629         REAL *ttbl;
00630         int fftlen;
00631 
00632         fftlen = nblock2( size ) * 2;
00633         z = newvec_COMPLEX( fftlen, "z" );
00634         ttbl = newvec_REAL( fftlen, "ttbl" );
00635         cfftm( FFT_INIT, fftlen, ( float * ) z, ( float * ) z, ttbl );
00636         for ( i = 0; i < FIRsize( filt ); i++ )
00637             z[i].re = FIRtap( filt, i );
00638         cfftm( FFT_FORWARD, fftlen, ( float * ) z, ( float * ) z, ttbl );
00639         for ( i = 0; i < size; i++ )
00640         {
00641             printf( "%d %f\n", i, Cabs( z[i] ) );
00642             delvec_COMPLEX( z );
00643             delvec_REAL( ttbl );
00644         }
00645     }
00646 #endif /*  */
00647     exit( 0 );
00648 }
00649 #endif /*  */
